message.body: So....there's a new bed in that back room! Queen pillow top! You guys will be very comfortable:)
And. Lava lamp
Now, there's an idea.....
Yesterday the film dept head at u of arts asked me to send him an email bc he thinks he can get me a painting adjunct job this semester
Yes!
Have you asked at mica?
Awesome. No I haven't looked or asked anywhere because I've been overwhelmed w the lil gallery spaces and editing etc
But this person is someone who approached me and set up a meeting w painting dept for me
Ah. It's hard to make choices. Or jhu???? They treat you best.
(He doesn't like me, so I know there are no ulterior motives. We actually dislike each other.)
It sounds great! See if it will lead to full e?
Time
Jesus id be happy w Anything
It sounds weird, but full time leaves more time for painting g than adjunct
I'd be happy w any teaching gig at all
Don't tell them that!!!!
LOL
I know
They are lucky it are even considering them!!!!!
Lol but would You be interested? I'll name drop you
You you are even considering
Yes I'd be interested
Awesome I will see what happens at interview :/
Right now I am thinking about how I canmake money to travel and paint
Good luck
When is it
Jhu and mica both have Film departments bye
Now
Not bye
Now
Oh! Neat
Very neat!
Thomas Dolby is at jhu
I don't know anything about film or video but that is neat
Oh! I thought you said film!
It sounded different.....
I like my art 2D tactile and portable
:) yup
Though with iPads.......
When is the interview?
Lol . The interview is for adjunct painting position but the person who approached me about it is their film dept head bc we know eachother bc I make him lattes lolol
He came to my show reception at coffee shop and looked at my cv and bla bla but I see him every Sunday and we argue over art
Bc I ...fundamentally disagree w him on Everything hahaha
Also he's a jerk

That's a riot. Lattes. Jeez, Ingrid if you are looking for full time( U ofOregon is five classes a year, that's it !) put your writing to work and apply! You've got the right creds, residencies, awards,more brains than anyone who might interview you....you can do anything!
That is cool!sometimes jerks can be ok.
But it doesn't matter!!! He came in yesterday and said he mentioned me to the painting dept head and they need an adjunct and he is setting up an interview for me
Then he gave me a back handed compliment saying their work is traditional and elitist and unconcerned w engaging the economic politics around us, so my work would fit right in LOL
Yeah. He's a jerk.
He's a huge jerk.
But, he really meant that in a good way. I am betting.
Ingrid. Boone dislikes you. They may disagree with you. But they don't dislike you.
Haha yep he did. My point was that he's not trying to flatter me to date me
He actually dislikes me. So when he says he mentioned me and asked them to consider hiring me, I believe him
You're right tho I'll start applying to stuff that is local :)
I've just been busy w my spaces and getting Vetri off ground ! So excited about Vetri
Lol no people find me annoying and naive sometimes but it's ok haha thank you!!!
Also those people suck
And I find them toxic and negative so it's fine lol
Let me know what I can do. I have no influence over sucky people, though.
Hahahaha see you soon!!!
See you soon!
